name: M19- Drum That Up!
description:
Become a drummer and show off your talent. You can test your memory by following a rhythm pattern or bang the drums and cymbals to create your own musical beat sequence. Children will observe, compare, contrast (same or different), and create music patterns. Children will be introduced to a variety of different musical instruments. They will be able to explore the instruments before playing the game, allowing them to become familiar with the different sounds that each one makes. Grade: Pre-K

Subject: Math
Section: Music
Lesson: Musical Patterns and Sequences Multilingual: This game can be played in English, French, Spanish, and Chinese
